TopicTitle: [My First KSP Video] Old Planes, F.A.R.-fetched Fun.

Articles.Content:
This is just a little video compilation of some old aircraft I'm very hesitant to send to the boneyard, mainly because I spent a lot of time tweaking their aerodynamics for high performance and ease of (keyboard) control.

I decided to give my 0.24 vintage planes one last flyoff - a sort of "Top Gun Over KSC" mini airshow featuring little jet trainers, survey aircraft and full sized cargo aircraft (with pre B9 interior bays!).

Enjoy and thanks for watching my first KSP video
